description:
A unofficial libre application to listen to public domain audiobooks. A unofficial libre application to listen to LibriVox audiobooks.

Some features it brings are:
  • Searching audiobooks by title, author and language
  • Downloading audiobooks to play offline
  • Remembering position in audiobook and resume when played again
  • Playing with the application in the background and with the screen turned off
  • User Interface in multiple languages (translations welcome!)

The application has no adds and is also fully open source under the GPL3 license, so if anything is not to your liking, feel free to contribute!
